explains: adv. 本质地；体质上；天生

sentences.en: He was much weakened constitutionally by the disease.
sentences.cn: 那场病使得他体质大大减弱。

sentences.en: He said the court provided no guidance about when recusal will be constitutionally required.
sentences.cn: 他说，最高法院没有明确指导规定，在什么情况下应该要求取消资格。

sentences.en: Members of Congress should be constitutionally barred for life from working as paid lobbyists.
sentences.cn: 从法律上，应当终生禁止议会成员从游说团体那里领取酬劳。
